```{r}
data(soil)
str(soil)
soil <-RFspatialPointsDataFrame(
 coords = soil[ , c("x.coord", "y.coord")],
 data = soil[ , c("moisture", "NO3.N", "Total.N", "NH4.N", "DOC", "N20N")],
 RFparams=list(vdim=6, n=1)) 
```
```{r}
soil["moisture"]
```

```{r}
Model <-~1+RMwhittle(scale=NA, var=NA, nu=NA) + RMnugget(var=NA)
summary(Model)
```
```{r}
fit <- RFfit(Model,data=dta)
summary(fit)
```

```{r}
opt <- "optimx"
print(system.time(fit <- RFfit(Model,data=dta, optimiser=opt)))
print(fit)
```

```{r}
dta <- Aalborg["Kontantpris"]
```
```{r}
Aalborg <- read.csv("Aalborg.csv")
str(Aalborg)
Aalborg <-RFspatialPointsDataFrame(
 coords = Aalborg[,c("xkoor", "ykoor")],
 data = Aalborg[,c("Kontantpris","")],
 RFparams=list(vdim=1, n=1)) 
```
```{r}
Pris <- Aalborg["data"]
```

```{r}
Model <-~1+RMwhittle(scale=NA, var=NA, nu=NA) + RMnugget(var=NA)
```
```{r}
fit <- RFfit(Model,data=Pris,allowdistanceZero=TRUE)
```
